packages.name: nvim
packages.description: Neovim is an extensible, modern Vim with enhanced performance, plugin support, and built-in terminal.

packages.name: chatgpt-shell-cli
packages.description: A minimal shell script for accessing OpenAI’s ChatGPT and DALL·E directly from the terminal.
packages.exec: dnf copr enable kylegospo/chatGPT-shell-cli -y && dnf install chatgpt-shell-cli -y

packages.name: kitty
packages.description: Fast, feature-packed, and highly customizable terminal emulator designed.

packages.name: rpmfusion
packages.description: Third-party software repository for Fedora and other Red Hat-based Linux distributions.

packages.name: mpd
packages.description: Music Player Daemon is an lightweight, flexible, and powerful server-side application for playing music.

packages.name: rmpc
packages.description: rmpc is a beautiful, modern and configurable terminal based Music Player Daemon client
packages.exec: dnf copr enable skoved/rmpc -y && dnf install rmpc -y
packages.config: sudo -u $USERNAME update-desktop-database /home/$USERNAME/.local/share/applications && sudo -u $USERNAME xdg-mime default "Rusty Music Player Client.desktop" audio/mpeg

packages.name: yazi
packages.description: Yazi (“duck”) is a Rust-based terminal file manager using async I/O for efficient, user-friendly, and customizable file management.
packages.exec: dnf copr enable lihaohong/yazi -y && dnf install yazi -y
